languages.text: {n}Кость неприятно хрустит, а руку пронзает острая боль — ваши усилия сделали только хуже. Держать оружие вы все еще можете, но каждое неосторожное движение наполняет жилы раскаленным свинцом.{/n}

{n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кость неприятно хрустит, а руку пронзает острая боль — ваши усилия сделали только хуже. Держать оружие вы все еще можете, но каждое неосторожное движение наполняет жилы раскаленным свинцом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm — your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

{n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hueso cruje de forma desagradable y un dolor agudo atraviesa tu brazo: parece que solo has conseguido empeorar la lesión. Aún puedes sostener tu arma, pero cada movimiento descuidado llena tus venas de plomo fundido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hueso cruje de forma desagradable y un dolor agudo atraviesa tu brazo: parece que solo has conseguido empeorar la lesión. Aún puedes sostener tu arma, pero cada movimiento descuidado llena tus venas de plomo fundido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨は嫌な音を立てて砕け、鋭い痛みが腕に走る。なんとかしようとしたが、裏目に出たようだ。まだ武器は持てるが、少しでも下手な動きをすれば、血管に溶けた鉛が流れ込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨は嫌な音を立てて砕け、鋭い痛みが腕に走る。なんとかしようとしたが、裏目に出たようだ。まだ武器は持てるが、少しでも下手な動きをすれば、血管に溶けた鉛が流れ込む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨头发出了刺耳的咯吱声，一阵剧痛刺穿了你的手臂。看起来，你的努力反而让情况变得更糟。虽然你依然能拿起来武器，但只要一个不小心，就可能就会将炽热的子弹倾泻在你自己身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨头发出了刺耳的咯吱声，一阵剧痛刺穿了你的手臂。看起来，你的努力反而让情况变得更糟。虽然你依然能拿起来武器，但只要一个不小心，就可能就会将炽热的子弹倾泻在你自己身上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Knochen knackt unschön, und ein scharfer Schmerz schießt dir in den Arm. Deine Bemühungen haben wohl alles nur noch schlimmer gemacht. Du kannst deine Waffe noch halten, doch jede unvorsichtige Bewegung füllt deine Adern mit geschmolzenem Blei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Knochen knackt unschön, und ein scharfer Schmerz schießt dir in den Arm. Deine Bemühungen haben wohl alles nur noch schlimmer gemacht. Du kannst deine Waffe noch halten, doch jede unvorsichtige Bewegung füllt deine Adern mit geschmolzenem Blei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez de remettre l'os en place, en vain. La douleur lancinante qui vous transperce le bras semble d'ailleurs indiquer que vos tentatives n'ont fait qu'empirer les choses. Vous pouvez toujours tenir votre arme, mais chaque mouvement brusque vous donne l'impression d'avoir du plomb fondu dans les veines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez de remettre l'os en place, en vain. La douleur lancinante qui vous transperce le bras semble d'ailleurs indiquer que vos tentatives n'ont fait qu'empirer les choses. Vous pouvez toujours tenir votre arme, mais chaque mouvement brusque vous donne l'impression d'avoir du plomb fondu dans les veines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kemikten nahoş bir çıtırtı geliyor ve kolunda keskin bir acı hissediyorsun. Çabaların, durumu daha da kötüleştiriyor. Silahını tutabiliyorsun ama her dikkatsiz hareketinde damarların âdeta sıvı kurşunla doluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bone crunches unpleasantly, and a sharp pain pierces your arm: it seems that your efforts have only made it worse. You can still hold your weapon, but each careless movement fills your veins with molten lead.{/n}
